troubleshooting.title: Syntax Highlights Not Available in Eclipse Plugin

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: I associated the .ext extension with in Eclipse but an .ext file opened with the plugin does not have syntax highlights.

steps-informal.p:
Associate an extension with in Eclipse versions by following these steps:
Associate the .ext extension with the plugin:
and go to General Editors File Associations .
Add *.ext to the list of file types.
Select *.ext in the list by clicking it.
Add to the list of Associated editors and make it the default editor.
Associate the .ext extension with the Oxygen XML content type:
and go to General Content Types .
Add *.ext to the File associations list for the Text XML
content type.
Press the OK button in the Eclipse preferences dialog box.
Result: Now when an *.ext file is opened, the icon and the syntax highlights should be the same as for XML files opened with the plugin.
